title: My computer clock doesn't run when because of League
body: This has been going on since the introduction of the beta client or around then. I have tried every possible fix and now is 100% sure it is caused by the new client. I uninstalled it and went back to legacy and the clock would run sometimes on that and sometimes not. So I reinstalled the beta and it never runs on that. By computer clock, i mean the time in the bottom right of the task bar. If I start a game at 8:54pm and after it ends, it would be still 8:54pm then it starts from there.

replies.body:
Hmm... that's pretty weird. Have you ensured that you've [**properly synced your system clock?**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues#wq3)

Let me know if this caused any change.
i have it open 24/7 so i can sync it after every game
How are you syncing the system clock? Is it the same method as I linked above, or is it a completely different method?
